Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.Main

  • public abstract class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry Point of the program. Class for the public static void main(String[] args) method.

    0.1.6.2 (08.10.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        I give you three chances to guess the purpose of this function. Hint: !cigam s'tI
        Parameters:
        args - command line parameters (not evaluated)

      • getAnnotationManager

        public static AnnotationManager getAnnotationManager()
        Returns the instance of the global AnnotationManager.
        Returns:
        instance of AnnotationManager

      • openNewSignalView

        private static void openNewSignalView(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae)
        Opens a DataSelectionDialog that ask the user to select previously loaded data. A new SignalView is created for the selected data.
        Parameters:
        ae - ActionEvent fired the calling UI-element

      • uiSelectAnnotation

        private static void uiSelectAnnotation()
        Opens a AnnotationSelectionDialog to select a EventEntry of a dataset to write annotations to.

      • uiCreateNewAnnotationFile

        private static void uiCreateNewAnnotationFile()
        Opens a DatasetSelectionDialog and creates a new EventEntry for the selected dataset with the given name. This method is called by the menu entry "Annotationen -> Kanal hinzufügen...".

      • saveAllDatasets

        private static void saveAllDatasets()
        Saves all datasets.

      • createSignalViews

        @Deprecated
private static java.util.List<DataController> createSignalViews(UnisensDataset ds)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates SignalViews for all Entrys of the given UnisensDataset and adds them to the SignalPanel.
        Parameters:
        ds - UnisensDataset to use
        Returns:
        the list of generated controllers

      • closeProgram

        private static void closeProgram(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae)
        Exits the program without saving changes to unisens datasets. Closes all open datasets and exits.
        Parameters:
        ae - ActionEvent causing this action

      • generateSignalViews

        @Deprecated
private static void generateSignalViews(int numSignals,
                                  int numDataPoints)
        Deprecated. 
        Used in early versions to create SignalViews with random data.
        Parameters:
        numSignals - number of SignalViews to create
        numDataPoints - number of data-points per SignalView

      • rescale

        @Deprecated
private static void rescale(double min,
                      double max)
        Deprecated. 
        Used in early versions to set the ranges of time axises of all SignalViews.
        Parameters:
        min - lower end for time axis
        max - upper end for time axis
